nodes.bodyText: I'm always a little iffy on these pipe-it-to-bash incantations. Can we vendor this script locally? If not, can we check for a checksum to ensure we're downloading what we expect?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -118,7 +118,9 @@ jobs:
             .circleci/copy-configs
       - run:
           name: Run integration test
-          command: .circleci/retry.sh 3 ./gradlew cAT --no-daemon
+          command: |
+              .circleci/retry.sh 3 ./gradlew connectedDebugAndroidTest jacocoFullReport --no-daemon
+              bash <(curl -s https://codecov.io/bash)

nodes.bodyText: Yes; I segregated these @Ignores into a separate git commit. The PR includes 2. (I needed the tests to work, in order to compute coverage.)

nodes.bodyText: Gotcha. This is a pretty major @ignore given we'll no longer have coverage for these common operations. We should probably add chores to address these when we can.
